border-radius.message: Use border-radius tokens (var(--radius-*)) instead of hardcoded values. Examples: var(--radius-sm), var(--radius-pill), var(--radius-full)

/^(padding|margin|gap|padding-top|paddin.message: Use spacing tokens (var(--spacing-*)) instead of hardcoded values. Examples: var(--spacing-xs), var(--spacing-sm), var(--spacing-md). For non-standard values (10px, 12px), add a comment explaining why.

font-size.message: Use font-size tokens (var(--font-size-*)) instead of hardcoded values. Examples: var(--font-size-14), var(--font-size-16), var(--font-size-20)

font-weight.message: Use font-weight tokens (var(--font-weight-*)) instead of hardcoded values. Examples: var(--font-weight-regular), var(--font-weight-medium), var(--font-weight-bold)

color.message: Use color tokens (var(--color-*)) instead of hardcoded colors. Examples: var(--color-primary), var(--color-text-primary), var(--color-neutral-80)

background.message: Use color tokens (var(--color-*)) or gradient tokens (var(--gradient-*)) instead of hardcoded values

background-color.message: Use color tokens (var(--color-*)) instead of hardcoded colors

border-color.message: Use color tokens (var(--color-*)) instead of hardcoded colors

comment-pattern.message: When using non-standard values (like 12px or 10px), start your comment with 'Non-standard:' to document the deliberate choice
